meanings.definition: To open or undo something that is closed.
meanings.sent1: I will unclose the door to let fresh air in.
meanings.sent2: She carefully unclosed the book to read the next chapter.
meanings.sent3: The magician will unclose the mysterious box to reveal its contents.
meanings.sent4: The detective unclosed the case, exposing the truth hidden within.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle touch, she unclosed the locket to reveal the precious photo inside.

meanings.definition: To reveal or disclose something that was previously hidden.
meanings.sent1: The explorer will unclose the ancient treasure map to reveal its secrets.
meanings.sent2: He slowly unclosed his feelings, sharing his thoughts with her.
meanings.sent3: The spy will unclose the secret message, exposing the hidden code.
meanings.sent4: The artist unclosed his latest masterpiece, unveiling it to the world.
meanings.sent5: As the clouds parted, the sun unclosed its radiant light upon the valley.
